resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Create a new one easily !
Start putting your shopping list. Create as many as you want.
Choose a list and make it as the active list.
Found the item you are looking for? Just scan the barcode using the application, and put the item in your trolley. The item will be checked from your shopping list automatically.
Avoid the long queue. Just show your QR code in order to pay at the cashier.
Welcome to CaddyHop, the next shopping revolution.
This tutorial will help you to get started using this application.
